profileAlternative.name: Ahmad J. Butt
profileAlternative.headline: Managing Partner - NYC's Best Digital Agency | Digital Transformation Expert | Strategic Management Certified
profileAlternative.summary:
A young pragmatic visionary individual in his 30's, driven by entrepreneurial spirit and goals execution, holding an extensive experience of corporate, business and technology strategy, designing and implementing a variety of risk based strategies and their management frameworks, etc. in a range of corporations, technology companies, financial institutions and telecom companies.

Having enjoyed success in hands-on strategic planning and execution, turnarounds & change management, strategic business development, start-up and growth management environments in companies’ full time leadership positions, I am passionate about helping entrepreneurs, companies and their leadership with strategic vision to align and embrace business and technologies with operations in order to redefine how they growth, collaborate, connect, communicate, compete and win in the marketplace. Furthermore, by teaming up and working closely with business leadership and cross-functional teams.

Certified from Harvard University & additionally an associate of COPC USA & Six Sigma. A motivated self-starter with exceptional analytical, organizational and communication skills is also a skilled coalition-builder with multicultural experience and possesses strong facilitation and negotiation skills

Having enjoyed success in hands-on strategic planning and execution, turnarounds & change management, strategic business development, start-up and growth management environments in companies’ full time leadership positions, I am passionate about helping entrepreneurs, companies and their leadership with strategic vision to align and embrace business and technologies with operations in order to redefine how they growth, collaborate, connect, communicate, compete and win in the marketplace. positions.title: Managing Member & CEO
positions.description:
HTML Pro (part of Nxenter Group) is a full scale digital agency specialized in developing digital products & generating sales through digital channels. We follow a 3 step recipe for start ups and existing businesses as tool for disruption;

- Direct the company in keeping with the vision outlined for the company
- Represent the company as required, including attendance of important functions, industry events and public meetings
- Work closely with Human Resources (HR) regarding hiring practices, payroll and benefit disbursement
- Oversee quality control throughout the company, establishing goals for each department in partnership with division manager
- Lead and motivate subordinates to advance employee engagement develop a high performing managerial team
- Oversee all operations and business activities to ensure they produce the desired results and are consistent with the overall strategy and mission
- Make high-quality investing decisions to advance the business and increase profits
- Enhance and/or develop, implement and enforce policies and procedures of the organization by way of systems that will improve the overall operation and effectiveness of the corporation.
- Integral part of the digital transformation team to develop capabilities surrounding cloud, transformation, digital process, innovation, social, mobile, analytics, IoT and more
- Be solution oriented with ability to have a vision on how to digitize an enterprise and communication this to our clients.
- Perform engagement management responsibilities, including performance reviews, task delegation, project scheduling, project financials, quality review and client management
- Manage, develop, train, coach and mentor staff on projects and assess performance for engagement and year-end reviews

Read MORE @ www.htmlpro.net

…
see more

Title
Head of Global Customer Management
positions.description:
Being part of the management team, my key responsibilities are to support the Globalization of customer service operations, transforming customer operations as per COPC global standards, standardization of KPI’s & processes, develop link between quality assurance & customer satisfaction, business process re-engineering, delivering on Net Promoter Score targets, and working with different stakeholders on closing inner and outer circle loops that causes dissatisfaction among customers.

positions.title: Managing Director
positions.description: Lead the offshore operations from North America to generate sales and international clientele management

given.text: Stunning manager who is not only detail oriented but also wants to remain close to his subordinates..... It was great having you as my boss

“Man of many talents, Ahmad is all about commitment & hard work. One of his abilities is consistency which you cannot miss. He has a good eye for details, Easy going lead by example kind of a leader. He is capable of translating visionary concepts into concrete processes plans that yield solid and timely workable results. He is well known for his tenacity to follow through on diverse and complex integrations with external entities.Takes time out of his schedule to help others... A good friend and a sound professional. Way to go Butt!"
…
See more

received.text: An example of passion for business!! A true mentor for all females that strive to achieve successful career. True Professional & Genuine Leader

One of very few high potential resource that has the energy and drive to manage daily operations and handles challenges with fun. Excellent stakeholder management and leadership capabilities that can translate into business success and to achieve high value goals.

items: Technical Help Desk Transition to Accenture
